title: Bug 42225: Unable to assign command to Ctrl+Backspace
description: When attempting to assign a command to Ctrl+Backspace, the assignment does not take effect.
OB: Ctrl+Backspace should delete the previous word by default.
EB: Currently, Ctrl+Backspace does not perform the expected action and the assigned command is not executed when pressing Ctrl+Backspace.
SR: Investigate and fix the issue causing Ctrl+Backspace assignments not to work properly.
